item.title: How I try avoid using mouse
item.description: Like most of the Dev’s I love using my Keyboard more than mouse. I am big vim fan and have been using vim for over 7-8 years. I still consider myself novice. Here are the ways I manage to use keyboard over mouse Shortcat – Great app get rids of use mouse in OSX – This is a Paid App , which IMHO is the best investment for me. There is also a trial version.
